rangeMaps.text: Running at 60hz. Do not use Washing machine

targets.query: SELECT mean("value") FROM "electrical.batteries.260.capacity.dischargedEnergy" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT integral("value",1h)*0.00044 FROM "electrical.inverters.261.acin.power" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1d) fill(null)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "electrical.batteries.260.capacity.consumedCharge" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
